page.title: 13Ditcham Park School
page.content: Ditcham Park is a private school for 300 pupils which was opened in 1976 to meet local demand for independent education. It is co-educational and has an age range of 4-16 years. Pupils travel from a wide area as transportis provided. There are 23 full time and 8 peripatetic teachers enabling a wide range of subjects to be taught. A gymnasium which is well equipped and extensive playing fields provide good facilities for physical education. At the age of sixteen public examinations are taken, subjects being chosen for these by consultation between pupil staff and parents. Education visits, projects with audio visual lessons form a part of junior school study. the school is non denominational Christian, but all faiths are accepted.
